messageBody:
hello sir,
Good morning. Actually i have no idea about junit testing. from where i can get all the details regarding this. how manually done junit testing as well as by using any IDE. lets think i am creating a class and successfully compile and run. but i want to how to make test cases for the class as well the methods. plz help me. bcoz i need these things in my current project.

Prabhat Kumar Mohanta
